title: Dona Marina, consequences of colonial expansion

content.question: The images above best provide evidence of which of the following consequences of colonial expansion in the period 1450 to 1750 ?

choices.label: The extension of regional trading networks and the consolidation of centralized power
The spread of new food crops and the development of syncretic forms of religion
The restructuring of the family and the growth of the plantation economy
The transfer of wealth to new elites and the development of new gender roles

content.answer: The transfer of wealth to new elites and the development of new gender roles

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
